```{r, include = FALSE, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(KTPmars)
```
<p>Mars Function:
```{r}
mc <- mars.control(Mmax = 10)
concrete <-mars(ConcreteCompressiveStrength~.,data=concrete)
toxic <-mars(LC50~.,data=fishToxicity)
yacht <-mars(RRPUWOD~.,data=yacht)
```

<p>Summary Function:
```{r}
summary(concrete)
summary(toxic)
summary(yacht)
```
<p>Print Function:
```{r}
print(concrete)
print(toxic)
print(yacht)
```
<p>Predict Function:
```{r}
predict(concrete)
predict(toxic)
predict(yacht)
```
<p>Anova Function:
```{r}
anova(concrete)
anova(toxic)
anova(yacht)
```
<p>Plot Function:
```{r}
plot(concrete)
plot(toxic)
plot(yacht)
```
